title: Suuji de Sukuu! Jyakushou Kokka
description:
With tensions between the neighboring country rising signaling the presence of a war soon to begin, Soalla, the princess of a small country, worried whether her own country would be able to defend itself with its weak national power. The king was bedridden and the retainers who were her last rays of hope had nothing but the antiquated motto of battle honor in mind. Not one person had a concrete proposal to protect the country, leaving Soalla to wonder if this was where Favell would fall… However, it was then that Naoki appeared before her. A "magician,"  that left his name in history who possessed the power she desired to save the country.
[hr][b][u]French/Français[/u][/b]
[spoiler]Tandis que les tensions entre pays voisins s’enveniment, faisant craindre à une guerre prochaine, Soalla, princesse du petit pays de Favell, s’inquiète de la capacité de celui-ci à se défendre, faible comme il est. Le Roi, malade, reste au lit et ses conseillers ne pensent qu’à l’honneur sur le champ de bataille. Personne n’a d’idée concrète pour sauver son pays, laissant Soalla compter les jours avant l’effrondrement de Favell… C’est à ce moment-là que Naoki apparut devant elle. Un « magicien, » qui laissa son nom dans l’histoire, possédant le pouvoir de sauver son pays.[/spoiler]
